Posted By: RedJaron (5/2/2012 12:16:33 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
So, what happens when you combine [Stromkirk Patrol](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Stromkirk Patrol) and an unprotected [Lumberknot](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lumberknot)? You get a pretty smexy vampire.   
  
So many aspects of this card make me want to get 30 of them. I've never felt so good about a non-rare (or mythic) in the Innistrad block since [Shimmering Grotto](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Shimmering Grotto).  
  
No doubt will I consider adding him to a ![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol)![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol) vampire deck. 4.5/5.
posts.html:
So, what happens when you combine Stromkirk Patrol and an unprotected Lumberknot? You get a pretty smexy vampire.

So many aspects of this card make me want to get 30 of them. I've never felt so good about a non-rare (or mythic) in the Innistrad block since Shimmering Grotto.

No doubt will I consider adding him to a vampire deck. 4.5/5.

posts.post_content: This guy smashes. I've heard people say he'd be absurd if he had evasion, but honestly if I can grow him some before he attacks that's fine, I almost WANT my opponent to block him. Yeah sure, get your guys out of the way so you have even less opportunity to deal with him.
